snippet.title: CMS for primary schools
snippet.description: SyndeoCMS (follow up of Site@School 2.4.10) is the Content Management System (CMS) for primary schools to manage and maintain their website in an easy way It can also be a very usefull CMS for small companies or non profit organizations.

snippet.title: FET- Free timetabling software
snippet.description: FET is free timetabling software for schools, high-schools and universities. Scheduling is done automatically. Please visit the project web site http://lalescu.ro/liviu/fet/ to be sure you always have the latest version

snippet.title: schaduler
snippet.description: schaduale time table for exams or schools

snippet.title: lessons_sheduler
snippet.description: This project is client-server software for planning lessons in high educational schools. The software allows: \- create educational plan; \- input all source data; \- print results; \- and more.

snippet.title: Bell System 2013
snippet.description: Free and OpenSource Project for Schools and Eduction Center

snippet.title: @School
snippet.description: @School is a project dedicated to the schools communities. @School acts as the central point in the relationship between the School organizer, the teachers, the parents ...

snippet.title: VirtualX -online examination tool
snippet.description: Virtual has all features that you need to manage an online examination

snippet.title: Structio. Constructing Knowledge in Col
snippet.description: Structio produces tools and contents with sources of public domain useful for colombian schools and appropriate to be distributed in Internet (e.g sotware, writings, images, sounds and music).

snippet.title: Javascript Clipper
snippet.description: Boolean operations and offsetting library in Javascript
